entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arctic Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arctic Bay Airport 07:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -36.6°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -41.3°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A few clouds. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 37 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 37 by morning. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
